meanings.definition: People who are the same age as each other.
meanings.sent1: My agemates and I all started school together.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys spending time with her agemates at the playground.
meanings.sent3: The group of agemates decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: In the world of superheroes, the agemates formed a powerful team to fight evil.
meanings.sent5: The bond between agemates is special and unique, growing stronger as they grow older.
